group_1.textCenter: I can do this…@I'm gonna nail it!
I'm gonna buy Rabi's dinner ingredients…!

group_1.textRight: You don't have to do that, Urara.@It's alright…

group_1.textLeft: You're busy, and you've got places to be.
Let me at least help out with the shopping!
See, I used to go around to all the local@supermarkets.
And I helped my family with our budget,@so I'm a good shopper.

group_1.textRight: …Very well. If you insist.
I'd like you to pick up the ingredients@on this list here.

group_1.textLeft: Gotcha!

group_1.textCenter: (Three horse mackerel fillets, a bag of bean@sprouts, tofu, and miso…)
I'll start at the vegetable counter.

group_1.narration: "Our flash sale begins now!@Today's featured item is THREE packs@of beef ribs for JUST 500 yen!@Only for one hour, only 500 yen!"

group_1.textCenter: You can't beat that…!@[chara:103601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:103601:motion_400][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]I gotta buy some!
Ah, right, Rabi asked me to…

group_1.narration: "Flash sale on NOW at the vegetable counter!"
"Bean sprouts for ONLY 5 yen per bag!@We're also offering a limited number@of the Curry Support Set value pack tonight,@which includes onions, carrots, and potatoes!"

group_1.textCenter: [chara:103601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I got a whole bunch for a steal!
I'm sure…this'll get Rabi to praise me!

group_1.textRight: Sorry to keep you waitin'!

group_1.textLeft: Hello, Urara♪
Now that we've all arrived, it is time to begin@the meeting.

group_1.textRight: Rabi, Rabi!@Check this out!

group_1.textLeft: Hm…?

group_1.textRight: Today's beef curry day, see!

group_1.textLeft: …Curry?

group_1.textRight: All this stuff was on sale at the supermarket.
I got a great deal on everything!

group_1.textLeft: You were helping Rabi with her errands, right?
Wonderful job♪

group_1.textRight: Nipah!
(I'm happy I could be useful to Rabi.)

group_1.textLeft: …Thank you for your help, Urara.
So…did you pick up the items on my list?

group_1.textRight: …[wait:1.0][chara:103601:cheek_0][chara:103601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:103601:lipSynch_1]Oh.
I'm sorry…@I completely forgot about that…

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear…

group_1.textRight: I'll go back out and buy 'em!

group_1.textLeft: It's fine. We can have curry tonight.
Nayuta and Mikage both like curry,@so it's not a problem.

group_1.textRight: But…!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: *Whimper* I'm so sorry…
(I wanted to be helpful to her. I wanted her@to tell me I did a good job…)

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it.@Everyone makes mistakes.
However… Sometimes you act without thinking@things through.
I'd like you to try to have a bit more self-control.

group_1.textRight: Okay…
(I just wanna be able...)
(to be mindful of my surroundings and act all@collected like you guys.)

group_1.textLeft: Then it is time to begin our reports.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I got an announcement to make today.
See, I'm actually goin' back to Yukuni for a day.

group_1.textLeft: Something you can't miss?

group_1.textRight: I'm quittin' the talent agency that helped me@as a street performer,
so I wanna go say goodbye for the last time.

group_1.textLeft: …That is indeed important, however…@Are you certain you can handle it alone?

group_1.textRight: I'll be totally fine! I'm not a child!
I screwed up my errands, but…
I can go talk to my agency all by myself!

group_1.textLeft: It's not that, just…
You're a well-known celebrity in Yukuni,@especially among students.
The Magical Girl eradication faction might@catch wind of you…

group_1.textRight: Ah…

group_1.textLeft: I'd like you to let me come with you in case@anything goes wrong.

group_1.textRight: …I understand.@Thanks for lookin' out for me.
